dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

dmca_clarifications: One I received a “Blogger DMCA takedown notification”  
I always removed the link from that certain post, I am not trying to share  
music links but rather promote the artist by including a banner and  
information about the artist’s album/single release information (ex. Video,  
Digital release info etc.) If provided with the chance to regain my blog  
(PopMusicHeaven.blogspot.com) I would not violate the DMCA violations and  
not post links at all. ~Thank you for your time
